info.title: Infisical API
info.description: List of all available APIs that can be consumed

post.description: Create token for machine identity with Token Auth

name.description: The name of the token to create.

parameters.name: identityId
parameters.description: The ID of the machine identity to create the token for.

get.description: Get tokens for machine identity with Token Auth

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to start from. If you enter 10, it will start from the 10th token.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of tokens to return.

parameters.name: identityId
parameters.description: The ID of the machine identity to list token metadata for.

projectName.description: The name of the project to create.

projectDescription.description: An optional description label for the project.

slug.description: An optional slug for the project.

template.description: The name of the project template, if specified, to apply to this project.

name.description: The name of the identity to create.

organizationId.description: The organization ID to which the identity belongs.

role.description: The role of the identity. Possible values are 'no-access', 'member', and 'admin'.

hasDeleteProtection.description: Prevents deletion of the identity when enabled.

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to list identities.
